summary: A man proposes to a woman he's met once, all in the same day.
cast: Scott Baio|John Seitz|Kim Martin|Zachary Mott|Shuler Hensley|Jennie Martin|Rose Bray|John Bechtol|Rosemary Prinz|Jody O'Donnell|Marty Sheets|Bingo O'Malley|Nick Tallo|Daniel Stafford|Philip Winters|John Amplas|Fred Lehman|Katherine McKenna|Rachel McCartney|Nardi Novak|Adrienne Wehr|Manik Bhojwani|Daniel Catanzaro|Barbara Thomas|Kristin Minter|Kevin Lageman|Nancy Bach|Paula Carroll|Mary Harvey|Tony Amen
title: The Bread, My Sweet
